cube_selection.title: Select a cube to validate
cube_selection.explanation: To validate your data cube, input your SPARQL endpoint and choose a cube to validate.

cube_validation.invalid: Cube does not conform to the selected profile
cube_validation.valid: Cube conforms to the selected profile
cube_validation.describe_observation_validation_process: 10 observations are validated, then another 10 observations are loaded and validated. This process is repeated up to 10 times. Once more than 20 errors have been found, the process is terminated.
cube_validation.observation_valid: Conforms to the Cube Shape constraints
cube_validation.observation_invalid: Does not conform to the Cube Shape constraints
cube_validation.url_error: Please provide a valid HTTP URL

footer.title: Federal Office for the Environment FOEN
